name: JavaScript Basics
description: Core JavaScript concepts every developer should know

questions.question: What is hoisting in JavaScript?
questions.answer: The behavior of moving variable and function declarations to the top of their scope during compilation

questions.question: What is a closure?
questions.answer: A function that remembers its lexical scope even when executed outside that scope

questions.question: Difference between == and ===
questions.answer: == performs type coercion before comparison, === checks both value and type without coercion

questions.question: What does 'this' refer to in JavaScript?
questions.answer: Refers to the object that is executing the current function

questions.question: What are the primitive data types in JS?
questions.answer: string, number, boolean, null, undefined, symbol, bigint
